data.title: WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP 2024
data.text:
2024

MONDAY 25TH NOVEMBER - WINMAU JUNIOR OPEN OF GIBRALTAR

ENTRY - https://jdcshop.net/index.php?route=product/product&path=66&product_id=142

TUESDAY 26TH NOVEMBER -THE LUKE LITTLER LEGACY OPEN

ENRTY - https://jdcshop.net/index.php?route=product/product&path=66&product_id=143

WEDNESDAY 27TH NOVEMBER - JUNIOR WORLD DARTS FINAL ROUNDS TO ALEXANDRA PALACE

WEDNESDAY PM 27TH NOVEMBER - THE JDC'S GALA EVENING - SUNBORN BALLROOM

THURSDAY 28TH NOVEMBER - WORLD CUP OF DARTS TEAM EVENT - GROUP STAGE 1

FRIDAY 29TH NOVEMBER - WORLD CUP OF DARTS TEAM EVENT - GROUP STAGE 2 - KNOCKOUT ROUNDS

Entry for the open events wll be from the summer of 2024

2024 CUT OFF FOR AGE ELIGIBILITY - PLAYERS MUST BE UNDER 18 AS OF 23/12/2024 FOR THE PARTICIPATION IN THE WORLD TEAM EVENT AND THE JUNIOR WORLD DARTS FINALS.

THE OPEN EVENTS A PLAYER CAN PLAY AS LONG AS THEY ARE UNDER 18 ON THE DAY OF THE EVENT

VENUE - EUROPA POINT SPORTS COMPLEX EUROPA POINT - GIBRALTAR

Everything you need to know about Gibraltar. Really useful information for your stay on the ROCK.

https://www.visitgibraltar.gi/general-info

Please keep up to date on the JDC socials too, as we have up to the minute information and news on Facebook and Twitter in the coming months.

Accomodation links -

For a discounted rate at the Holiday Inn Express please book direct via email - This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it. . Please use the discount code JDCGIB24 reservation in the email text. In the subject please write For the Attention of Pablo. He will be dealing with JDC Bookings.

Individuals can send booking requests to This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it. with reference JDC Darts Event.

These rooms are opposite the venue with a bus stop right outside and a cafeteria.

NB - The Government of Gibraltar announced the introduction of a Sustainable Tourism Tax (STT) that took effect as from 1st August 2022. All visitors staying in hotels in Gibraltar from that date onwards will have to pay Â£3.00 per person per night for the duration of their stay. This tax will be payable locally at the hotel and will be applied to all reservations. The STT will represent a supplement to the prices in your booking confirmation regardless of whether you booked direct or through an agent.

THE HOLIDAY INN EXPRESS GIBRALTAR WILL BE A HUB OF JDC ACTIVITY AWAY FROM THE VENUE.

Useful links -

ALL OF OUR PLAYERS WILL BE PLAYING ON THE BEST IN THE BUSINESS

ROLL OF HONOUR - JDC JUNIOR WORLD DARTS CHAMPIONS

2015 JOSHUA RICHARDSON - ENGLAND

2016 MAIKEL VERBERK - NETHERLANDS

2017 RUSTY JAKE RODRIGUEZ - AUSTRIA

2018 JURJEN VAN DER VELDE - NETHERLANDS

2019 KEANE BARRY - IRELAND

2021 BRADLY ROES - NETHERLANDS

2022 LUKE LITTLER - ENGLAND
